> I am interested to see if other developers found any benefits
> from UNIT testing their Exception classes. Perhaps there are
> best practices on how to develop and test exceptions in Java?

If they don't do more than delegating constructor calls to the super class,
I don't test them. If they do more, I *might* be inclined to do so,
depending on how sure I was to get it right without the tests.

Cheers, Ilja
